dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Beware, puny creature, you stand before the might of the Glacial Talonrider. What brings you into my domain?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am Eldryn Stormcaller, here to rid these lands of darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hah! A Half-Elf mage, challenging me? I will enjoy breaking your feeble resolve.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You underestimate me. Face the consequences of your actions.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from one who will soon kneel before me. Prepare for your demise, mage!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not back down. Let our powers clash in battle!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Feel the icy wrath of the wyvern’s fury!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see no honor in this fight. I retreat for now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coward! Flee while you can, but know that you cannot escape fate.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let us not resort to violence. We have a common enemy in the darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You speak of unity while wielding magic against me? Hypocrite! There is no place for your kind here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek no quarrel with you. Let us part ways peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fine. Leave my sight and do not return, or next time I will not show mercy.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not be threatened by the likes of you. Prepare for a fight.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your defiance will be your downfall. Taste the wyvern's wrath!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense fear in your words. Do you doubt your own strength?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Doubt is for the weak, not for one who commands the skies. Your arrogance will be your undoing.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I stand by my convictions. Let our actions speak for us.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Face the icy talons of the wyvern, and may your demise be swift.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps there is a way for us to find common ground. Let us talk.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Talking will not save you from your fate. Prepare for battle or be crushed beneath the wyvern's might.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am a traveler seeking knowledge and understanding in these gloomy lands.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge? Understanding? Ha! Such lofty ideals will not save you from the frosty claws of the Glacial Talonrider.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no wish to quarrel. Can we not coexist peacefully?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peaceful coexistence is a fantasy. Either submit to my will or face icy retribution.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I choose to walk away. Your path of destruction is not mine to follow.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you flee, remember that the wyvern's shadow looms over you, waiting for the final strike.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Defiance is the path I choose. Brace yourself for a clash of ideals.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your defiance is your doom. Feel the frostbite of the wyvern's wrath!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your threats hold no power over me. I walk my own path.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a naive traveler. Your path leads straight into the jaws of the wyvern.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense fear behind your bravado. What are you truly afraid of?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fear? I fear nothing! Least of all a mere traveler who dares to challenge me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If our paths must cross in battle, so be it. Let fate decide our encounter.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fate has already sealed your destiny. Feel the piercing cold of the wyvern's rage!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am but a wanderer passing through. No need for hostilities.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wanderer or not, trespassers are not welcome in the realm of the Glacial Talonrider.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Understood. I will leave peacefully. No harm intended.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your departure is wise. The wyvern's wrath spares those who know when to retreat.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not be threatened on my journey. Prepare for a clash if that is your wish.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Clash you shall, wanderer. Feel the chill of the wyvern's vengeance!
